<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Persistent Lodestone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1232)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 186 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a firearm with a  reload  of 1

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You miss on a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon using an ordinary 0-level piece of ammunition.

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small magnetite block is attached to the barrel of the firearm by a thin metal wire drilled through a hole in its center. When you activate the lodestone, the ammunition from your missed shot is immediately recalled to your firearm, allowing you to fire again without reloading.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Persistent Lodestone
